name: Wiener don't use drugs (Weenie Cop Reshared)
name_original: Wiener don't use drugs (Weenie Cop Reshared)
description:
Weenie Cop - a game made by Pizza Tower Guy, before Pizza Tower. This project got discontinued. In this game, you pick any character you would like: Peter (Weenie), or Mac (Burg).
You can shoot,kill, and mach in this game. It starts off with a tutorial, then it teleports you to Fry Boys level. In the end of the Fry Boys, theres a boss fight, but, you can't kill the boss, so you will get softlocked, until some game maker genius fixes all of this.
So, in this archive, theres the game + unfinished,testing,cancelled levels.
Have fun playing.
Controls: Z - Jump, X - Attack, C - Shoot, Shift - Dash
Pizza Tower Guy's Tumblr: https://wienerdontusedrugs.tumblr.com
Pizza Tower Guy's Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=15632871
Cover image by dudi123456#4198
